nodes.bodyText: I'm guessing this is commented out because dhis2/dhis2-antlr-expression-parser#7 had not yet been merged. But perhaps it could be commented back in now, since the other PR has now been merged?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -49,6 +49,7 @@
         .put( V_ANALYTICS_PERIOD_START, new vAnalyticsPeriodStart() )
         .put( V_CREATION_DATE, new vCreationDate() )
         .put( V_CURRENT_DATE, new vCurrentDate() )
+       // .put( V_COMPLETED_DATE, new vCompletedDate() )

nodes.bodyText: I believe this logic came from @Bekkalizer, so I trust that. But I wonder if it should also be applied in other places where getProgramIndicatorEventColumnSql is used like vEventDate, vCreationDate, and ProgramBetweenFunction.getCompareDate. We don't need to change this method, but it would be worth asking Marcus about the others.

+import org.hisp.dhis.parser.expression.CommonExpressionVisitor;
+import org.hisp.dhis.program.AnalyticsType;
+
+/**
+ * @author Zubair Asghar
+ */
+public class vCompletedDate extends ProgramDateVariable
+{
+    @Override
+    public Object getSql( CommonExpressionVisitor visitor )
+    {
+        if ( AnalyticsType.EVENT == visitor.getProgramIndicator().getAnalyticsType() )
+        {
+            return "completeddate";
+        }

+import org.hisp.dhis.parser.expression.CommonExpressionVisitor;
+import org.hisp.dhis.program.AnalyticsType;
+
+/**
+ * @author Zubair Asghar
+ */
+public class vCompletedDate extends ProgramDateVariable
+{
+    @Override
+    public Object getSql( CommonExpressionVisitor visitor )
+    {
+        if ( AnalyticsType.EVENT == visitor.getProgramIndicator().getAnalyticsType() )
+        {
+            return "completeddate";
+        }
